additionalProperty.name: Warning
additionalProperty.value: Always read the label. Follow directions for use. Do not use on cracked porcelain, worn plastic, marble, wood or other bathroom surfaces and fittings. For advice, contact a Poisons Information Centre (Phone Australia 13 11 26; New Zealand 0800 764 766) or a doctor. If swallowed, give a glass of water to drink. If in eyes, wash out immediately with large amounts of water. Consult a doctor of irritation persists. If skin contact occurs, wash skin thoroughly.

description: Harpic Fresh Power Toilet Cleaner Tropical Blossom
name: Fresh Power Toilet Cleaner Tropical Blossom
